<a id="VisualShaderNodeVectorOp"></a>

# VisualShaderNodeVectorOp

**Inherits:** [VisualShaderNodeVectorBase](VisualShaderNodeVectorBase.md) **\<** [VisualShaderNode](VisualShaderNode.md) **\<** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

A vector operator to be used within the visual shader graph.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

A visual shader node for use of vector operators. Operates on vector ``a`` and vector ``b``.

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Operator](VisualShaderNodeVectorOp.md#enum_VisualShaderNodeVectorOp_Operator) **OP_POW** = `5`

Returns the value of the first parameter raised to the power of the second, for each component of the vectors.<a id="VisualShaderNodeVectorOp_constant_OP_MAX"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Operator](VisualShaderNodeVectorOp.md#enum_VisualShaderNodeVectorOp_Operator) **OP_MAX** = `6`

Returns the greater of two values, for each component of the vectors.<a id="VisualShaderNodeVectorOp_constant_OP_MIN"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Operator](VisualShaderNodeVectorOp.md#enum_VisualShaderNodeVectorOp_Operator) **OP_MIN** = `7`

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Operator](VisualShaderNodeVectorOp.md#enum_VisualShaderNodeVectorOp_Operator) **OP_CROSS** = `8`

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Operator](VisualShaderNodeVectorOp.md#enum_VisualShaderNodeVectorOp_Operator) **OP_ATAN2** = `9`

Returns the arc-tangent of the parameters.<a id="VisualShaderNodeVectorOp_constant_OP_REFLECT"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Operator](VisualShaderNodeVectorOp.md#enum_VisualShaderNodeVectorOp_Operator) **OP_REFLECT** = `10`

Returns the vector that points in the direction of reflection. ``a`` is incident vector and ``b`` is the normal vector.<a id="VisualShaderNodeVectorOp_constant_OP_STEP"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Operator](VisualShaderNodeVectorOp.md#enum_VisualShaderNodeVectorOp_Operator) **OP_STEP** = `11`

Vector step operator. Returns ``0.0`` if ``a`` is smaller than ``b`` and ``1.0`` otherwise.<a id="VisualShaderNodeVectorOp_constant_OP_ENUM_SIZE"></a>
